document_data.name: Jalia Mossgreen
document_data.mainbody: '''Jalia Mossgreen''' was the most prominent of the [[Swords of Archendale]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Activities: As the [[Black Sword]], Jalia supervised the [[Archendale]] militia. In public role she owned and managed the [[Old Stonebows]] inn.
document_data.History: In 1368 Jalia was the oldest of the Swords and was semi-retired from the role.
